channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Person Communications
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Person Communications

item.title: CVE-2023-37410|2024-09-24T15:38:14.521Z -- ibm -- person%20communications
item.description: IBM Personal Communications 14.05, 14.06, and 15.0.0 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges to the SYSTEM user due to overly permissive access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 260138.
